name: Joe McGinnis
text: Good pizza good service my wife got the hot chick pizza  , who would have thought pickles on pizza would be good but it was, try it!

name: Mike Jackson
text: We have always liked the thin crust pepperoni pizza.  We got a medium of that. Good as always.  My wife and I each added a salad.  She got the garden salad and I had the carprisi salad.  One of the best salads I've ever had.  Addie at the window was great too

name: Richard Polnau
text: Ingenious and very tasty.

name: Himanshu Agrawal
text: Worst service with improperly cooked pizza,      Person was reminding every time that they are going to close and hurry up. I have not seen such kind of behavior/service in any restaurant. â€¦More

name: Meg Foglietti
text: Great Food! I LOVE their Big Don Italian Sub, it's a true Italian grinder with a nice toasted bun! Their pizza is great with either the thin & crisp or hand tossed crust!! The delivery can be pretty slow so I just pick-up at the drive through and I can usually get my order in 20 minutes!

name: Rumblers Gear
text:
Your servers could be nicer and not as disgruntled
Look around at lunch time
Empty huh?

name: Dan Matthews
text: I'm a truck driver from out of town and had delivery wow the service was wonderful and this sandwich awsome.Dan.

name: D Sebring
text: Phenomenal pizza, edge to edge pepperoni! Gluten Free crust available and quite tasty!  Very nice waitress.

name: Alissa Simon
text: Food was good and hot. Wait staff was friendly and cheerful. Place could have been cleaner and neater, but it was far from gross.

name: Kenzie Mormile
text: I've always had positive experiences here. Friendly employees and good pizza. The drive thru and online ordering options are great as well!

name: Mike Zrimsek
text: Fast service and pizza came out great in a very reasonable amount of time.

name: John Newman
text: Always good pizza. Always. Great service at this location.

name: Mark Thomas
text: The pizza tastes great. However they seem unable to get the order correct. It's no longer worth the effort to order a pie, go to pick it up, and then have to wait 20 minutes more while they make it again. I've wasted hours and hours waiting. I'm done.

name: Andy Vara
text: Great service, tasty pizza, Donatos!!

name: Bruce Glivar
text: Good pizza here. Perfect crust and a little spicier than most take out pizzas. Sorry the Twinsburg location closed.

name: Kimberly Dugas
text: Food is great but don't go after 10 on a Saturday. Even though the sign says open til midnight, they'll try to tell you the dining room is closed.

name: O Hassen
text: Service was good. Pizza was ok, not great. The cheese thin crust felt like rubber

name: dan mcdonald
text: They don't care when they screw up an order, they told me they would send a new pizza out, and then it never came, called the next day they said they were really sorry about that, they never did credit my card like they said they would. Horrible manager, and snobby kids work there.

name: Matthew Jaffe
text: Always good pizza and good service.

name: Chris Kucharik
text: More interesting than your average pizza place.  I'm a big fan.

name: Phil Avery
text: Ordered twice. Both times order was wrong. They promised me a credit and never gave it to me. It's a sign of the times, prices are way up, service and quality is way down.

name: Clayton Morris
text: Great place to eat....

name: David P
text: My company buys us pizza. Orders atleast 50 larges for 3 shifts.have to tell you. Its the worst pizza money can buy.green olives on a pizza? Sauce .to much. No cheese.terrible pizza plain n simple.we told the company no more from there plz.

name: Jay Sanders
text: Workers suck. Pizza not worth the price seriously lil cesar better.

name: Elizabeth Dickson
text: Got in and out with my hot food

name: Anna R
text: My favorite pizza. Always. Love.

name: Dave Cesna
text: Food was good bit very slow service if you dine in.

name: Nathen Martin
text: Came from elsewhere in Ohio and the reviews had my hopes down, but these guys make the same Donatos pizza I got back home and they're friendly too. No complaints.

name: Delrico The Man
text: Amazing service and great pizza

name: Allen Sexton
text: Cause the money is great and food is awesome

name: Steven Marino
text: Good pizza at a reasonable  price.

name: Lea Ellen Morton
text: Love Donatos Pizza, always a friendly place, great food.

name: Angelus Damaskinos
text: My order was over and under cooked they tried to refuse me a refund or a new order when when I came with receipt of purchase I even took a picture of burnt food showing them I was on the phone for an hour til I just said forget and and went up there to only get rudeness no professional at all I give it 10 thumbs down

name: Robert brown
text: horrible service....  dont even bother

name: Jason L
text: I ordered a serious meat pizza no ham, pizza was covered with ham....look at the damn order.

name: Jim Bucks
text: Gluten free pizza!

name: Kevin Donmoyer
text: Pepperoni covers the whole pizza from edge to edge

name: Summer
text: Good pizza

name: Valerie Gruben
text: Service there sucked.

name: Chaim R
text: Yummy pizza

name: Shelly Paschal
text: I ALWAYS order pizza from here and pay over the phone with my credit card. Now the new store manager "Eric" has a problem as well as horrible customer service. I WILL NEVER SERVICE THIS STORE AGAIN!
